Author: blackjok3r#3181
Content:
Its ONLY about getting into recvmask as fast as possible, ther only 2 things that determine that are:
1) ping to all other nodes, lower ping to higher % of nodes does better
2) listunspent call time

Author: blackjok3r#3181
Content: on LABS the listunspent call is really a non factor, as we have a special wallet, that optimizes it out of the box to go as fast as possible... at least sftware wise it cant really be increased ... so the only other thign to do is get the IPs of all notaries from iguana (there is a RPC for this) then ping them all and see how fast it is
